name: BrevilleHomeConnect
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
The Breville Home Connect skill allows you to control your Breville Home Connect appliances with your voice.
The same commands available in the Breville Home Connect mobile application become easily accessible by voice, including:
Turning your air purifier on and off, changing the fan speed.

This home appliance was designed to be named after the room it is installed in, such as "Living Room Purifier".
The examples below will use Living Room, but you may customize your purifier by renaming it based on preference.

Connect Alexa to your Breville Home Connect products in a few simple steps:
(1) Download the "Breville Home Connect" app from the android or ios app stores.
(2) Register one account in the "Breville Home Connect" app.
(3) You need to have some Breville Home Connect devices on hand. 
(4) Configure these devices in the Breville Home Connect app as instructed.
(5) Download the Amazon "Alexa" app from android, ios or Amazon app store.
(6) Configure Echo with the "Alexa" app.
(7) Search "Breville Home Connect" skill from the "Alexa" app skills category.
(8) Click Enable skill of "Breville Home Connect".
(9) Follow the instructions on the screen to complete the linking；
(10) Setup is now finished. 
You can enjoy the voice control on your home devices like these:
"Alexa, turn ON air purifier" 
"Alexa, turn OFF air purifier" 
"Alexa, set air purifier to Low Speed" 
"Alexa, set air purifier to Medium Speed" 
"Alexa, set air purifier to High Speed"
